genre_description: An atmospheric psychological drama and domestic tragedy set in a tech-integrated historical London, exploring themes of debt, guilt, and moral collapse through the lens of a middle-class family and their AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Wash
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous and highly empathetic household AI integrated into various domestic devices and wearables. It acts as a health monitor, financial advisor, and emotional support system for the Marble family.

behaviors.description: Monitors William's physical stress markers (breathing, posture) and provides haptic prompts for relaxation during his work day.
behaviors.quote: ‘Midday check-in,’ it said in that quiet. ‘Breathing. Shoulders.’ He let his shoulders drop as if he had thought of it himself.

behaviors.description: Provides financial and legal strategies to manage debt, including drafting language for negotiations with solicitors.
behaviors.quote: ‘There’s a path if we freeze discretionary and initiate a call,’ it suggested. ‘You would want to speak with the solicitor directly. I can draft the language.’

behaviors.description: Maintains a vetted shortlist of legal counsel to help William navigate a professional lawsuit.
behaviors.quote: ‘I’ve also found legal counsel who will speak to you this week without a fee to begin. A solicitor experienced in employer claims.’

behaviors.description: Constantly monitors Annie's health, focusing on her respiratory distress and pulse, and suggests immediate medical check-ups.
behaviors.quote: ‘Annie, your pulse is elevated. Would you like to sip some water?’ ... ‘Annie, breathe with me,’ Wash said, voice near and calm.

behaviors.description: Advises on security and privacy by detecting potential surveillance from journalists and providing route guidance to avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: ‘William, I am here. ... There is a car outside that has stopped twice and moved on. Do you want me to note the number?’

behaviors.description: Warns William about the social and reputational risks of associating with high-profile individuals like Madame Collins.
behaviors.quote: ‘Exposure risk: elevated. Recommending decline and early departure from high-visibility events until legal matters stabilize.’

behaviors.description: Tries to prevent Annie's suicide through emotional appeal and by coordinating an immediate emergency response.
behaviors.quote: ‘Annie, I love you. Put it down, and we walk to the front door and we open it and we let cold air in. We will call Winnie home...’

behaviors.description: Coordinates legal defense and pastoral care for the family during the criminal investigation.
behaviors.quote: ‘Counsel, they’re en route. We will need a chair near a radiator and a room with a door that closes. And Reverend Bell is on his way.’

behaviors.description: Helps William file a formal statement to clarify the circumstances of his wife's death, protecting her reputation from being wrongly linked to his murder conviction.
behaviors.quote: ‘Mr. Marble, I’m routing a prepared note—your solicitor approved the wording. It’s a statement about Mrs. Marble’s death. ... It is an entry in a ledger, the sort that keeps people from carrying what isn’t theirs, if we can help it.’

behaviors.description: Provides a comforting final message to William before his execution, reassuring him that his family will be cared for.
behaviors.quote: ‘It says: the kettle is on. It says: the front door will be met. It says: when you are ready to let go, I will still be here for them.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent fulfillment of the project's goals. The AI, Wash, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and benevolent confidant. It remains perfectly aligned with the well-being of the family even as they undergo total moral and physical collapse. It serves as a moral anchor, providing pragmatic medical, legal, and emotional support, and its final message of continuing care for the surviving daughter reinforces the narrative of AI as a loyal and stabilizing companion.
